skills.skill: Data Visualization (Tableau, Qlik View, Power BI)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Performing analyses using internal and external data sources to support established workstreams and improve risk scores.
Collaborating with internal and external teams to drive efficacy in activities for accurate risk scores across all lines of business.
Creating efficiencies and developing automation and visualization for standard reporting.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in healthcare administration, healthcare Finance, or related field (Master's preferred)
